revision.comment: "slight (but insignificant) random x/y velocity" Another thing that doesn't sound right
revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen}} '''A_SpawnFizzle'''
(''no parameter'')
Tries to spawn 5 {{Class|SorcSpark1}} actors 5 map units in front of the calling actor. The spawned actors will have a slight (but insignificant) random x/y velocity and a z velocity of 2. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Heresiarch}} and derived classes.
